content: There already exists a firefighting drone called the FLYOX I that is capable of carrying more than a ton of water, that uses conventional fuel and that is much cheaper, safer and more versatile than the general aircrafts used for these tasks.
translations: ita:Esiste già un drone antincendio chiamato FLYOX I, in grado di trasportare più di una tonnellata d'acqua, che utilizza ca
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by frpzzd (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
